name: SRS Ontology - Coordinate Operation module
abstract: A building block defining SRS Ontology Coordinate Operation Module
description:
## SRS Ontology Coordinate Operation Module

This module describes how to model a planetary entity using the SRS ontology vocabulary.

Coordinate Operation classes and properties are described under the namespace https://w3id.org/geosrs/co/

![SRS Ontology Coordinate Operation Module](assets/co.png)

examples.title: SRS Ontology Coordinate Operation Module Example
